exceptions.exn: The LHS of Derive_opp (Derive (fun x : R => - _ x) _) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of Derive_n_comp (Derive_n (Derive_n _ _) _ _) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of IHn (Derive_n (fun x : R => - f x) n x) does not match any subterm of the goal

original: induction n. - simpl. rewrite Derive_opp. auto. - simpl. rewrite Derive_n_comp. rewrite IHn. auto.
